definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of ultrasound in the diagnosis of theca cell tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討超聲檢查在卵泡膜細胞瘤診斷中的價值。

sentences.english: Investigations led to the diagnosis and treatment of subclavian artery stenosis.
sentences.chinese: 檢查明確鎖骨下動脈狹窄的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the diagnosis and treatment features of pulmonary heart disease caused by tuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討肺結核所致肺心病的診斷和治療特點。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical diagnosis of B-mode ultrasound to gynecologic acute abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討B型超聲對婦科急腹症的臨牀診斷價值。

sentences.english: Aim To investigate the treatment and clinical diagnosis of right lower-abdominal mass.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討右下腹包塊的臨牀診斷與治療。

sentences.english: Objective To explain the diagnosis and treatment of retrobulbar hematoma after baggy eye-plasty.
sentences.chinese: 目的介紹眼袋成形術併發球后血腫的診斷和治療。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the performance level and awareness of CT imaging with brain abscess .
sentences.chinese: 目的提高對腦膿腫CT影像學表現的認識和診斷水平。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of high frequency ultrasound in diagnosis of trauma of tendo calcaneus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高頻超聲對跟腱損傷的診斷價值。

sentences.english: The downside is that you won't get a formal diagnosis nor prescription.
sentences.chinese: 不足之處是你無法得到正式的診斷書及處方。

sentences.english: Demonstrate ability to diagnose and discuss the etiologies of vesicular and bullous skin lesions.
sentences.chinese: 學習診斷及探討水皰及大皰皮膚病變之病因。

sentences.english: Diagnosis was established on clinical findings and the barium enema examination.
sentences.chinese: 診斷主要依靠臨牀表現和鋇劑灌腸透視。

sentences.english: Objective To review the experience of diagnosis and surgical treatment for giant tumor of mediastinum.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討巨大縱隔腫瘤的診斷和外科治療經驗。

sentences.english: ABSTRACT OBJECTIVE:To determine the value of color Doppler ultrasound examination in diagnosis of testis and epididymis diseases.
sentences.chinese: 探討彩色多普勒超聲檢查診斷睾丸附睾疾病的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnostic value of diaphragm activity range to foreign body transmitted X-rays in bronchus.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價橫膈動度對透X線性支氣管異物的診斷價值。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the diagnosis and treatment of the upper urinary tract calculi in pregnant woman.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討妊娠期上尿路結石的診斷和治療方法。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical value of B-Type ultrasonic diagnosis of clonorchiosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討利用B型超聲診斷華支睾吸蟲病的臨牀價值。

definition: to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
